summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2734 for the improvement of Norman Street, from Twentieth Avenue South to Davis Place, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same, constructing wooden curbs and gutters and temporary wood walks and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 32326, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
